often!  Anyway, it 
looks like rather early Akasaka to me (like second gene=
ration Tadamasa), but then also has 
a newer look to the metal (or perhaps =
this is just the tsuba's excellent condition???)...  So, 
based on what Tor=
igoye/Haynes have to say about Tadashige, I'll go with that choice.  
Sorry=
, not too up to snuff on my Akasaka yet...
